messages.content: ComfyUI-Prediction is a fully customizable Classifier Free Guidance extension for ComfyUI, developed by RedHotTensors and released by Project RedRocket.
You can install ComfyUI-Prediction by cloning the repo into ComfyUI/custom_nodes or using ComfyUI-Manager.
Where can you find the custom nodes provided by ComfyUI-Prediction?
All custom nodes provided by ComfyUI-Prediction are located under Add Node > sampling > prediction.
What are the steps to set up a fully custom prediction in ComfyUI-Prediction?

To set up a fully custom prediction, you need to use the Sample Predictions node as your sampler, connect the sampler input to a sampler node like KSamplerSelect, connect the sigmas input to a scheduler node like BasicScheduler, chain one or more prompts using CLIP Text Encode and Conditioned Prediction nodes, and finally connect the result to the noise_prediction input of your Sample Predictions node.
What are some of the primitive nodes available in ComfyUI-Prediction?

Some of the primitive nodes available in ComfyUI-Prediction include Conditioned Prediction, Combine Predictions, Scale Prediction, Switch Predictions, Scaled Guidance Prediction, and Characteristic Guidance Prediction.
What are some of the prebuilt nodes available in ComfyUI-Prediction?

Some of the prebuilt nodes available in ComfyUI-Prediction include Switch Early/Middle/Late Predictions, Interpolate Predictions, CFG Prediction, Perp-Neg Prediction, and Avoid and Erase Prediction (v2).
What are some of the sigma utility nodes available in ComfyUI-Prediction?
Some of the sigma utility nodes available in ComfyUI-Prediction include Select Sigmas, Split At Sigma, and Log Sigmas.
What are the limitations of ComfyUI-Prediction?
ComfyUI-Prediction does not currently support ControlNet, and regional prompting may work but is untested. Additionally, any other advanced features affecting conditioning are not likely to work.
What is the license for ComfyUI-Prediction?
The license for ComfyUI-Prediction is the same as ComfyUI, which is GPL 3.0.
